message_history.content:
A conversation between User and Assistant. The user asks a question, and the Assistant answers it. The Assistant analyzes the given question and information in the mind, retains important relevant information, calls a search engine to find necessary information, accesses web pages with certain urls, and provides the user with the answer. The Assistant conducts search by <search> query </search>, access certain url by <access> url </access>, and the top search results and url page will be returned between <information> and </information>.  The reasoning processes are enclosed within <think> </think>. Finally, the Assistant provides answer inside <answer> and </answer>, i.e. <answer> answer here </answer>. If there are multiple queries, ensure all answers are enclosed within <answer> </answer>, seperated with comma. 

Note: the question is a valid question and you should try to find a correct answer. 

User: I want to buy a camera to take landscape photos. I heard that Nikon is good at taking landscapes and want to buy a mirrorless camera. Please help me collect the information of all Nikon Z series products as of the first half of 2025. The information I want to know is: effective pixels, weight, maximum frames per second, shutter speed range, highest number of focus points, digital image processor, ISO range, in-camera shock reduction technology.
The weight specifically refers to the weight of the camera body itself, including the battery and memory card; The highest number of focus points refers to the higher value between single-point AF and auto-area AF.

Please output the sorted data in the format of one Markdown table. The column names in the table are: Camera Model, Effective Pixels, Weight, Maximum Frames per Second, Shutter Speed Range, Highest Number of Focus Points, Digital Image Processor, ISO Range, In-camera Vibration Reduction Technology.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is: 
 ```markdown
{data_content}
```.

Assistant: 
<think>

To find the information about Nikon Z series products, I'll search through reliable sources. </think>
<search> what is the effective pixels weight maximum frames per second shutter speed range highest number of focus points digital image processor iso range in-camera shock reduction technology nikon z series as of first half 2025 </search>

Search query: what is the effective pixels weight maximum frames per second shutter speed range highest number of focus points digital image processor iso range in-camera shock reduction technology nikon z series as of first half 2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://imaging.nikon.com/imaging/lineup/mirrorless/z_8/):
Z 8 | Mirrorless Cameras | Nikon Consumer Pixel-shift shooting offers a new level of high resolution of up to approx. 180-megapixels. Solid but compact body with robustness and excellent drip- and dust- ...

Specifications - of Nikon Online Documentation Focus points *. 493 focus points. Number of focus points available in photo mode with single-point AF selected for AF-area mode and FX selected for image area.

[Doc 3](https://www.nikonusa.com/p/z-fc/1671/overview?srsltid=AfmBOopDoYfccUwq5dDT5DusQNVybb1f8z-6Y8qx-KqXzFruUUJjEaht):
Nikon Z fc Black | Mirrorless Cameras | Nikon USA Cutting-edge Z series tech. Quality that thrills. What sets the Z fc apart is the 20.9MP DX CMOS sensor paired with the Expeed 6 engine and the light-gathering ...

[Doc 4](https://photographylife.com/nikon-z-series):
Nikon Z Explained: Complete List of Cameras, Lenses & More (2026) It shoots 11 frames per second stills as well as 4K video, and it has eye-tracking autofocus (including some animal eyes) for portraits and ...

[Doc 5](https://www.dpreview.com/reviews/nikon-z8-review):
Nikon Z8 review: a supercharged D850 successor - DPReview The Nikon Z8 is a mid-sized high-end full-frame mirrorless camera built around the same sensor and processor as the range-topping Z9 sports camera.

I need to gather specific information about effective pixels, weight, maximum frames per second, shutter speed range, highest number of focus points, digital image processor, ISO range, and in-camera shock reduction technology for Nikon Z series products. I'll focus my search on these specific models.

</think>
<search> nikon z series effective pixels weight maximum frames per second shutter speed range highest number of focus points digital image processor iso range in-camera shock reduction technology </search>

Search query: nikon z series effective pixels weight maximum frames per second shutter speed range highest number of focus points digital image processor iso range in-camera shock reduction technology

| Camera Model       | Effective Pixels | Weight       | Maximum Frames per Second | Shutter Speed Range                  | Highest Number of Focus Points | Digital Image Processor | ISO Range                      | In-camera Shock Reduction Technology |
